org.dsa.iot.dslink.util.log

Class LogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.util.log.LogManager

  • public class LogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for setting the default log level for all loggers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected LogManager()
      Protected to allow sub-classes to call the constructor but don't permit outsiders to construct LogManager instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void configure(java.io.File logPath)
      Configures the root logger with a different layout.
      static LogLevel getLevel()
      Retrieves the root logging level, which may also be the global root level.
      static void setBridge(LogBridge logBridge)
      Replaces the default log manager with a custom log manager.
      static void setLevel(LogLevel level)
      Sets the global logging level
      static void setLevel(java.lang.String level) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogManager

        protected LogManager()
        Protected to allow sub-classes to call the constructor but don't permit outsiders to construct LogManager instances.

    • Method Detail

      • setBridge

        public static void setBridge(LogBridge logBridge)
        Replaces the default log manager with a custom log manager. This allows for use with custom slf4j back ends.
        Parameters:
        logBridge - Custom log manager to set.

      • setLevel

        public static void setLevel(java.lang.String level)

      • setLevel

        public static void setLevel(LogLevel level)
        Sets the global logging level
        Parameters:
        level - Level to set

      • configure

        public static void configure(java.io.File logPath)
        Configures the root logger with a different layout.
        Parameters:
        logPath - Path where the logger should output to or null to log to standard output steams.

      • getLevel

        public static LogLevel getLevel()
        Retrieves the root logging level, which may also be the global root level.
        Returns:
        Root logger level
